Flow.interviewLabel: Scheduleflow Lead: Contacted SMS and Emails {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Scheduleflow Lead: Contacted SMS and Emails

textTemplates.name: DowntownEmail01
textTemplates.text:
Hello Neighbor!

Welcome to TenTen Downtown!

A brand new luxury apartment building in downtown LA.

If you're looking for a fully furnished apartment with hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, and gorgeous views from every angle - you're definitely in the right place!

At TenTen Downtown, you will be joining a Live, Work, Play community that boasts 5-star amenities ranging from an onsite restaurant, bar, pool, theater, gym, sauna, meeting rooms, retail area, and event space...

TenTen Downtown also has the LARGEST rooftop area in North America!

If you're looking to create a work/life balance and have the opportunity to build connections with like-minded entrepreneurial people, TenTen Downtown has everything you need and so much more!

Schedule Tour

What makes us the best choice
for you?

During our tour I'll take you around and show you…

1) Our luxuriously furnished, all-inclusive, move-in ready, live/work suites, which come with everything included: in-unit laundry machines, linens, premium cable, high-speed internet, local phone service, water, gas, and electricity!

2) TenTen's 5-star, resort-inspired and Instagram-worthy amenities such as our award-winning rooftop with a pool and panoramic views of DTLA, Hollywood and the ocean, 24h Gym, Full-Service Spa, Lounge area, on-sire bar, barbecue, and more!

3) Our unparalleled conference rooms, board rooms, event spaces, lobby business directory, and feature-rich business center.

4) The 24-hour valet, garage parking, and courtesy patrol which make your stay here convenient and safe.

5) And our small “perks” like open-air billiards, foosball, ping pong tables, and barbecue area there to make your “Live, Work & Play” experience unforgettable.

You get all of this situated at a majestic high-rise at the perfect center of Los Angeles and surrounded by world-class stores, Michelin star restaurants and one-of-a-kind beaches…

Everything above is included in our simplified monthly prices starting at…

  • Studios - $2,930
  • 1 Bedroom Suites - $3,290
  • 2 Bedroom Suites - $3,554
  • 3 Bedroom Suites - $5,100

Are you ready to experience the pinnacle of live/work
apartment lifestyle?

Call us at 866-327-3190, or click below to book a tour
with a leasing agent today!

Schedule Tour

Warm regards,
{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel}

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

textTemplates.name: DowntownEmail02
textTemplates.text:
Hi Neighbor,

The world around us is constantly changing, so it makes sense for your living situation to catch up with the times, right?

At TenTen Downtown, long gone are the days of sacrificing cost, comfort, or quality - this luxury apartment building combines the perfect blend for new-age living.

With beautiful apartments plus ample opportunities for networking events, mixers, creative brainstorms, and more – you really can have it all at TenTen Downtown.

What can you expect with our move-in-ready apartments?

- Sweeping views of Downtown Los Angeles
- 2 acres of rooftop space that's perfect for hosting events
- Ground floor retail units for all your shopping needs
- Secure Garage parking and pet-friendly suites are available
- Convenient access to a gym, sauna, steam room, and pool
- All apartments are fully furnished and equipped with linens
- High-end stainless steel appliances and CaesarStone counters
There is nothing more you could want in a luxury apartment in the heart of
Downtown LA.

There is nothing more you could want in a luxury apartment in the heart of
Downtown LA.

Reply to this email, book a tour right now, or call/text our leasing agent today at 866-327-3190 to schedule your tour.

P.S. All TenTen Live/Work units are 67% tax-deductible.

Warm regards,
{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel}

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

textTemplates.name: DowntownEmail03
textTemplates.text:
Hey Neighbor,

TenTen Downtown will suit your every need...

Whether you want a studio or multiple bedrooms, a place to host events or business meetings, or you want to relax or talk deals – you can do it all at TenTen Downtown.

You can choose your floorplan and your lease length – we offer flexible terms with no minimum commitment.

Everything is included in our simplified monthly prices starting at…

Studios - $2,930
1 Bedroom Suites - $3,290
2 Bedroom Suites - $3,554
3 Bedroom Suites - $5,100

With so many options and the ability to live, work and play all in one place, TenTen Downtown is the ultimate choice for your future home.

Contact our leasing agent at 866-327-3190 or click here to book a tour with one of our friendly agents today!.

What are you waiting for?

Units are going fast, especially with our unbeatable offer of providing your first 2.5 months rent-free!

Warm regards,
{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel}

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

textTemplates.name: WilshireEmail01
textTemplates.text:
Hello Neighbor!

Thank you for inquiring for an apartment at TENTEN Wilshire!

My name is {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel}. I'm here to ensure you have an unforgettable experience with us and our “live, work & play” ecosystem.

So if you have any questions or requests, you can simply reach out to me at {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.Email__c} or give me a call at {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.Phone_Number__c}.

And if you need me to take you on a tour around our unrivaled DTLA location, just click the button below and schedule your visit.

Schedule Tour

What makes us the best choice
for you?

1) TENTEN's work/live suites are fully furnished and they come with everything you'll ever need - including in-unit laundry machines, cable TV, 100Mbps wired and wireless internet, local phone service, water, gas, and electricity (all inclusive).

2) You also get unlimited access to our unparalleled leisure amenities like our amazing rooftop with a pool, 24h high-tech gym, SPA center, jacuzzi, lounge, barbecue area and more…

3) You get access to our theater room, movie theater, game rooms, and regularly scheduled rooftop events.

4) You also get to enjoy our small perks like open-air billiard, foosball, ping pong, and cozy fire pits for long and stimulating talks.

All of that is situated at the perfect center of downtown LA, at a walking distance from Michelin star restaurants and word-class event venues. I think you're going to LOVE the exclusive atmosphere and amenities TENTEN Wilshire has to offer.

Especially considering our pricing, which starts at just…

  • Studios - $3,119
  • 1 Bedroom Suites - $3,463
  • 2 Bedroom Suites - $3,965
  • Two Story Lofts - $5,140
  • 3 Bedroom Suites - $5,470

Interested in the TENTEN Wilshire experience?

Then click the button below to schedule a free tour now!

Schedule Tour

{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire

P.S. Oh, and did I mention we've also got some celebrities living here? But don't tell anyone though…

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

textTemplates.name: WilshireEmail02
textTemplates.text:
Hello Neighbor!

I'm super excited about your interest in TENTEN Wilshire.

I’m sending you this email to introduce myself and let you know that I’ll be there every step of the way to make your stay with us…

UN...

...BELIEVABLE!

My name is {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} and I’ll be your dedicated relationship manager.

You can turn to me whenever you have any questions, need assistance scheduling a property tour or you need advice picking the best place for your needs.

Just send me a quick email at {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.Email__c} or give me a call at {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.Phone_Number__c}.

Or if you want to come right over and check out our one-of-a-kind work, live & play ecosystem you can do that by simply clicking the button below.

Schedule Tour

What makes us the best choice
for you?

During our tour I’ll take you around and show you…

1) Our luxuriously furnished, all-inclusive, move-in ready, live/work suites, which come with everything included: in-unit laundry machines, linens, premium cable, high-speed internet, local phone service, water, gas, and electricity!

2) TENTEN’s 5-star, resort-inspired and Instagram-worthy amenities such as our award-winning rooftop with a pool and panoramic views of DTLA, Hollywood and the ocean, 24h Gym, Full-Service Spa, Lounge area, on-sire bar, barbecue, and more!

3) Our unparalleled conference rooms, board rooms, event spaces, lobby business directory, and feature-rich business center.

4) The 24-hour valet, garage parking, and courtesy patrol which make your stay here convenient and safe.

5) And our small “perks” like open-air billiards, foosball, ping pong tables, and barbecue area there to make your “Live, Work & Play” experience unforgettable.

You get all of this situated at a majestic high-rise at the perfect center of Los Angeles and surrounded by world-class stores, Michelin star restaurants and one-of-a-kind beaches…

Everything above is included in our simplified monthly prices starting at…

  • Studios - $3,119
  • 1 Bedroom Suites - $3,463
  • 2 Bedroom Suites - $3,965
  • Two Story Lofts - $5,140
  • 3 Bedroom Suites - $5,470

Want to experience the luxury and comfort
TENTEN Wilshire provides?

Then click the button below and schedule your
FREE tour now!

Schedule Tour

{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire

P.S. Oh, and did I mention that we also host multi-billion-dollar startups and world-famous actors?

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

textTemplates.name: WilshireEmail03
textTemplates.text:
Hey Neighbor,

This is {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire.

Havent talked to you in a while…

Just wanted to follow up and see if you found the right type of place to stay in DTLA?

I'm asking because I though you'd be a perfect fit for our live, work & play community.

If you've found something, then great!

But if you're still searching or you're not super happy with your current residence, I wanted to remind you that you're always welcome here!

We've introduced a few new and special offers since we last spoke.

Studios - $3,119
1 Bedroom Suites - $3,463
2 Bedroom Suites - $3,965
Two Story Lofts - $5,140
3 Bedroom Suites - $5,470

Sounds interesting?

Then just shoot me a quick email and I'll tell you more.

Or you can simply schedule a free tour and see why so many tech people, actors, musicians and entrepreneurs are choosing TENTEN Wilshire over any other type of accommodation.

Cheers!

{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire

P.S. Did I mention that we organize regular events at our amazing rooftop?

As a member of TENTEN Wilshire, you'll be invited to ALL of them, which makes socializing that much easier when staying with us.

Here's a quick video from one of our recent events.

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

textTemplates.name: WilshireEmail04
textTemplates.text:
Hey Neighbor,

This is {!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire.

I just wanted to know if you got my previous e-mails?

I’m asking because I haven’t heard from you in a while.

Is it because…

  1. You have some questions or hesitations regarding staying in our one-of-a-kind live, work and play community?
  2. You think what we offer is far more than what you need for your stay here in Los Angeles?
  3. You’ve just found something that suits your needs better?

Please reply to this email with a short answer, so I can give you the information you need or stop sending you emails.

Thank you!

{!UserEmailOwnerRecordToUse.MasterLabel} from TENTEN Wilshire

P.S. If you were just postponing your stay with us, you can easily schedule a free tour by CLICKING HERE!

TenTen Wilshire & Downtown, 1010 & 1027 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90017, USA, (877) 338-1010

Unsubscribe Manage preferences
